duties_responsibilities.duty: Act as a technical resource for Cost Management within the Platinum, Turnaround Methodology work process.
Integrate the project cost estimate, work hour estimate, and project schedule into the Cost Management baseline.
Develop and maintain cost reports, cash flow/cancellation curves, and contingency analyses.
Assist in developing spending curves and monthly cost forecasts for turnaround projects.
Ensure accurate reflection of committed/spent funds, project deviation notices, field change orders, and project execution changes in all cost documents.
Provide supporting data for project execution metrics, external benchmarking and turnaround closure.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business or Finance or relevant discipline (Master's preferred)
